## Introduction 

Convert the Daily OHLC data of a stock to Monthly data. The dataframe should contain six columns named `SYMBOL`, `OPEN`, `HIGH`, `LOW`, `CLOSE`, `DATE`. 


```
library(nser)
data(dailydata)
daytomonth(dailydata)
```
